records.title: A timeless classic
records.content: Witty, romantic, and surprisingly modern. Elizabeth Bennet is one of literature's most beloved heroines.

records.title: Delightful read
records.content: A wonderful exploration of love, class, and society in Regency England.

records.title: The foundation of science fiction
records.content: Asimov's vision of the future is breathtaking. The concept of psychohistory is genius.

records.title: A masterpiece of mystery
records.content: The ultimate locked-room mystery. Christie at her best!

records.title: Absolutely magical
records.content: A sweeping epic that spans generations. Marquez creates a world you never want to leave.

records.title: Melancholic beauty
records.content: Murakami's prose is like music. A haunting story of love and loss.

records.title: Visionary AI stories
records.content: These stories introduced the Three Laws of Robotics. Essential sci-fi reading.

records.title: Surreal and captivating
records.content: A journey through dreams and reality. Murakami's most ambitious work.
